portfolios.name: Playmeets
portfolios.description: Playmeets is a website application, targeting the parents who want their child to play and mingle with other kids of the same age group by joining and/or posting an event. Instead of going to the playgrounds and other play centres alone, a parent can post an event in Playmeets to inform and invite others to join them.

portfolios.name: Country Weather App
portfolios.description: Weather app for the user's country. Multiple forecast for different zip codes within the country is possible.

portfolios.name: Toof Fairy
portfolios.description: A basic dentist appplication, focusing on react-router.

portfolios.name: Todo List
portfolios.description: A checklist application which add, edit inline, delete and clear the list items.

portfolios.name: Calculator CLI
portfolios.description: A command-line interface calculator for addition, subtraction, multiplication, division and finding the minimum, maximum and mean number.
